vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == newOwner, "AcceptOwnership: only new owner do this.");
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
DFProtocol.destroy (DFProtocol.sol#186-189) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-iDFEngine.destroy(msg.sender,_feeTokenIdx,_usdxAmount) (DFProtocol.sol#187)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function deposit(address _sender, address _tokenID, uint _feeTokenIdx, uint _amount) public returns (uint);
vulnerability_findings.message: IDFEngine.deposit (DFProtocol.sol#6) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.message: IDFEngine.withdraw (DFProtocol.sol#7) should be declared external
